title: AI Image Generation
description: Trace the evolution of AI-generated images from early GANs to modern diffusion models like DALL-E and Stable Diffusion. Understand how machines learned to create art.
targetAudience: Creative professionals and anyone curious about AI art tools
keyTakeaways: Understand how GANs pioneered AI image generation
Know the difference between GANs and diffusion models
Explain how DALL-E and Stable Diffusion work at a high level
